title: The Walking Dead season 10 episode 5 teaser: King Ezekiel's death confirmed?
text:
The Walking Dead appears to be lining up a devastating end for King Ezekiel, just moments after his kiss with Michonne.

Last night’s fourth instalment from season 10, titled Silence The Whisperers, saw the rock of the group overcome his depression with help from Michonne (played by Danai Gurira), who counselled and comforted him before her own impending exit.

However, a clip released teasing next week’s nail-biter may have revealed Ezekiel’s time is coming to an end – with a cough.

The first look at What It Always Is shows Ezekiel, Daryl (Norman Reedus) and Siddiq (Avi Nash) – who fans think may be secretly working for The Whisperers – at Hilltop helping to salvage the wreckage from a blistering walker attack.

Advertisement

Advertisement

When Ezekiel asks if the survivors have managed to find Negan (Jeffrey Dean Morgan), who escaped and left us with a whole heap of questions, there’s a subtle warning that the worst is about to happen.

What’s more, the official synopsis for episode five reads: ‘Supplies go missing from Hilltop; Negan is idolized by an Alexandrian; Ezekiel holds a secret.’

Michonne helped King Ezekiel’s road to recovery with a kiss: (Picture: AMC)

The season 10 premiere touched on Ezekiel’s cough when he was exposed to a forest fire caused by a satellite. Naturally, it was overlooked as a reaction to the clouds of smoke bursting from the flames.

Khary Payton – who’s starred as the king since season seven – warned fans: ‘Something horrible is about to happen.’

‘I mean, what are you talking about man? You know the show that you’re dealing with,’ he teased to Comicbook.com.

‘You know the show that you’re dealing with and you also know that I’m not going to be able to tell you a goddamn thing.’

The Walking Dead continues Sundays on AMC and follows a day later on Fox UK.

description: The Walking Dead season 10 episode 5 teaser: King Ezekiel's death confirmed with a cough?
